Reviews.Title: “Dirty room and far from the citycenter...”
Reviews.Author: Jasmin S
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Green Anka Hotel for 4 days from 28th August 2011 til 01 September 2011. We had a double room with 2 single beds. The room was very dirty you could find hair from serveral people you stayed there before everywhere! The blanket was dirty aswell. It was noisy at night because you could hear airplanes starting/arriving and the air conditioning system was very loud. We could also hear the noise from the street above the hotel. The breakfast was horrible. The bread was already dry and old the the rest of the buffet. Of course it depends on the time when youÂ´re having breakfast we varied from very early to late. One time we were lucky and the breakfast was ok but nothing special. We weÂ´re just in the Hotel to sleep so it was okay but we will definately not come back to this hotel! But Istanbul was fantastic its magical while Ramadan! I wanna go back to Istanbul very soon!

Reviews.Title: “Good, dont expect something special”
Reviews.Author: Eli F
Reviews.Content: Great city view on the roof! good for bed and breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Good Not Great”
Reviews.Author: summerpopsicle
Reviews.Content: Breakfast good - some variety, location Great very near Metro, and shops and banks and restaurants. Area completely safe even into wee hours of 2am in Summer. Stayed here twice: at the beginnning of our trip to Turkey and at end. Totallly different experiences! First experience was not pleasant - shoved 3 beds into average sized room so very crowded! Hotel staff mean and not accomodating! On way back different staff super nice and broke our rooms into 2 for same price. Excellent 2nd time around - rooms on 1st floor seemed roomier and bathrooms larger!

Reviews.Title: “chip and confortable”
Reviews.Author: kadirx
Reviews.Content: By chance we found Green Anka Hotel and the hotel was really nice, employees was kind and helpful. If u dont wait too many things and u came istanbul for business green anka hotel is a good choice...

Reviews.Title: “Do Not Stay A Lot in Green Anka”
Reviews.Author: Azar_Maluki
Reviews.Content: Although the hotel was clean and calm, and the service was very good, but the rooms were very hot to sleep in or to stay more than an hour or two in the hotel. The air conditioning (A/C) was central and the rooms must be full in order to operate the A/C otherwise you should tolerate the humid hot weather inside the rooms??? The restaurant food was average, of little amounts, and the staff may lift the dishes while you are still eating??? I never recommend this hotel for families or couples, especially for long stay.

Reviews.Title: “Dipend on the price...”
Reviews.Author: MarcoI1
Reviews.Content: We were in a big room for 3 persons...so a lot of space! breakfast was ok also for the quantity. The room was clean everyday, except the toilette (I don't know why!). Staff was ok, not special as all the turkish people, but ok...there is a promotion: staying there more of 4 days you get the transfer from airport to hotel for free. We payed about â‚¬18,00 for persons for a double (triple!) room...but i don't know if it was made by a problem of the website booking.com (also the guy of the reception told us that normally the price is the double!). The hotel is quite far from the center, but there is the tram line just in the street in front of the hotel that goes directily to the center. Findikzade infact is about 5 stops from Sultanhamet. Anyway it's quite far from Taksim (the best place for the life of the night). The good thing is that it's not a turistic place and prices and life is originally turkish!

Reviews.Title: “Green Anka substandard”
Reviews.Author: Westerner64
Reviews.Content: The Green Anka is poorly located in Istanbul requiring a long tram ride to the major tourist attractions in Istanbul. We found rooms were very noisy and experienced brown water running from taps before hot water was available. Staff were not focused on good customer service. Breakfasts were average.

Reviews.Title: “Seen better hotels in my time”
Reviews.Author: pragasam
Reviews.Content: We spent the last day of our Turkey tour here before boarding the plane home. The tour company booked our tour group here unexpectedly - perhaps to cut corners and keep the company's expenses low. We had been in a 3-4 star hotel in Taksim the previous 2 days. From the outset, the Green Anka Hotel felt like a low-budget joint. Small uninviting lobby, smallish lift, steep spiral staircase. Entrance to hotel opened to a very narrow street. One had to be careful of suddenly emerging traffic.. Location was close to Findikzade tram station - convenient to get to Sultanamet and Eminonu. Room was small and needed a new coat of paint and refurbishing. We were served by waiters at the dining room as part of the deal. Food was not so great or sumptuous.

HotelInfo.Name: Green Anka Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Millet Caddesi Findikzade Sokak No:4, Findikzade, Istanbul 34270 , Turkey
